overview_of_class: This class is a first course in the theory of modular forms.
name: Algebraic Number Theory
title: WCAS MATH 482-2-61 Algebraic Number Theory

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This class is a first course in the theory of modular forms.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Undergraduates by permission of instructor only

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: Topics to include: Classical holomorphic modular forms and Eisenstein series, Maass forms, Hecke operators and L-functions, modular forms as functions on the adele group, the classification of representations of GL_2 over a local field, the Jacquet-Langlands correspondence.

subject: MATH
